tool.name: Spatial Visualization
tool.command:
mkdir -p '${output.files_path}/A/0' && ln -sf '$image' '${output.files_path}/A/0/image01.ome.tiff' && #if $masks bfconvert -pyramid-resolutions 4 -pyramid-scale 2 '$masks' '${output.files_path}/A/0/masks01.ome.tiff' && #end if python '$__tool_directory__/vitessce_spatial.py' --inputs '$inputs' --output '${output.files_path}' --image '${output.files_path}/A/0/image01.ome.tiff' #if $masks --masks '${output.files_path}/A/0/masks01.ome.tiff' #end if --anndata '$anndata' &&
cp -R '$__tool_directory__/static' '${output.files_path}' && cp '$__tool_directory__/index.html' '$output';

param.name: masks
param.label: Select masks for the OME Tiff image (Optional)

param.name: anndata
param.label: Select the anndata contaning phenotyping info

param.name: description
param.label: Input the description of the dataset
